des: "This is one of my favorite recipes because it is light and very tasty. I had one of my family members try it and she thought it was so good that it was a recipe from a published cookbook. It is the best sweet sandwich you will ever taste! Perfect for all ages."
ins:
Mix apple, banana, apple juice, and strawberry jam together in a bowl.
Spread peanut butter on both slices of bread. Top one piece of bread with fruit mixture. Place second slice of bread over the fruit mixture.
